question: How do solar panels work and what are the latest technological advancements?
true_answer: Solar panels convert sunlight into electricity using photovoltaic cells. Recent advancements include bifacial panels, perovskite solar cells, and solar skins.

steps.description: Research latest advancements in solar technology
Analyze and compile a comprehensive report
